LayoutNode.Content: Product Information
LayoutNode.SRC: Product Information

LayoutNode.Content: Overview
LayoutNode.SRC: Overview

LayoutNode.Content: Fit for your life, BeatsX earphones are the perfect wireless companion. Experience authentic, clear sound throughout your day with up to 8 hours of battery life. With Fast Fuel, a 5-minutecharge gives you 2 hours of playback. Its unique Flex-Form cable provides all-day comfort and easy pocket portability, while eartip options provide a personalized fit. Driven by the Apple W1 chip Incorporating the efficient Apple W1 chip brings seamless setup and switching for your Apple devices,* up to 8 hours of battery life, and Fast Fuel technology for 2 hours of play with a5-minute charge. Wireless the way it should be BeatsX works as hard as you do. Sleek, light, and compact, these earphones are your perfect wireless companion. They instantly set up—just power on and hold near your iPhone—thensimultaneously connect to your Apple Watch, iPad, and Mac*. Stay connected. Stay in the zone. RemoteTalk allows you to take calls with a built-in mic, play music, adjust volume, and activate Siri. The Apple W1 chip features Class 1 Bluetooth connectivity—the industry-leadingclassification for range and signal strength. With best-in-class performance, BeatsX seamlessly syncs to your devices, so you can easily move about, keep the music going, and stay productivethroughout your day. Sound that stays with you BeatsX features authentic, clear sound with optimized noise isolation for an immersive listening experience. An innovative acoustic design delivers a clean treble response and distortion-freebass for the most natural tonality across a broad range of genres. Fit for your life Whether playing in your ears or hanging around your neck, BeatsX is incredibly sleek and comfortable for all-day wear. The unique Flex-Form cable provides a flexible fit, while a variety ofeartip options offer personalized comfort. And when you’re not wearing your earphones, magnetic earbuds keep them tangle-free, and they easily coil up for compact portability. *Requires iCloud account and macOS Sierra, iOS 10, watchOS 3 or later versions
LayoutNode.SRC:
Fit for your life, BeatsX earphones are the perfect wireless companion. Experience authentic, clear sound throughout your day with up to 8 hours of battery life. With Fast Fuel, a 5-minute charge gives you 2 hours of playback. Its unique Flex-Form cable provides all-day comfort and easy pocket portability, while eartip options provide a personalized fit.

Driven by the Apple W1 chip

Incorporating the efficient Apple W1 chip brings seamless setup and switching for your Apple devices,* up to 8 hours of battery life, and Fast Fuel technology for 2 hours of play with a 5-minute charge.

Wireless the way it should be

BeatsX works as hard as you do. Sleek, light, and compact, these earphones are your perfect wireless companion. They instantly set up—just power on and hold near your iPhone—then simultaneously connect to your Apple Watch, iPad, and Mac*.

Stay connected. Stay in the zone.

RemoteTalk allows you to take calls with a built-in mic, play music, adjust volume, and activate Siri. The Apple W1 chip features Class 1 Bluetooth connectivity—the industry-leading classification for range and signal strength. With best-in-class performance, BeatsX seamlessly syncs to your devices, so you can easily move about, keep the music going, and stay productive throughout your day.

Sound that stays with you

BeatsX features authentic, clear sound with optimized noise isolation for an immersive listening experience. An innovative acoustic design delivers a clean treble response and distortion-free bass for the most natural tonality across a broad range of genres.

Fit for your life

Whether playing in your ears or hanging around your neck, BeatsX is incredibly sleek and comfortable for all-day wear. The unique Flex-Form cable provides a flexible fit, while a variety of eartip options offer personalized comfort. And when you’re not wearing your earphones, magnetic earbuds keep them tangle-free, and they easily coil up for compact portability.

*Requires iCloud account and macOS Sierra, iOS 10, watchOS 3 or later versions

LayoutNode.Content: Highlights
LayoutNode.SRC: Highlights

LayoutNode.Content: Connect via Class 1 Bluetooth with your device for wireless listening Up to 8 hours of battery life for when you’re on the go With Fast Fuel, a 5-minute charge gives you 2 hours of playback when battery is low Variety of eartip options offer personalized comfort Flex-Form cable provides all-day comfort with easy purse and pocket portability Authentic, clear acoustics deliver crisp sound fit for your life Take calls, control your music, and activate Siri with RemoteTalk
LayoutNode.SRC:
Connect via Class 1 Bluetooth with your device for wireless listening

Up to 8 hours of battery life for when you’re on the go

With Fast Fuel, a 5-minute charge gives you 2 hours of playback when battery is low

Variety of eartip options offer personalized comfort

Flex-Form cable provides all-day comfort with easy purse and pocket portability

Authentic, clear acoustics deliver crisp sound fit for your life

Take calls, control your music, and activate Siri with RemoteTalk

LayoutNode.Content: Most Interesting Recently Answered My ears are almost kid sized and my old beats are constantly falling out. How adjustable are these buds? Asked by Riley P from irvine on Oct 11, 2018 Answer now (My ears are almost kid sized and my old beats are constantly falling out. How adjustable are these buds?) 1 Answer (My ears are almost kid sized and my old beats are constantly falling out. How adjustable are these buds?) How long do the BeatsX Earphones take to fully charge? Asked by Blair M from Carmel on Mar 4, 2017
LayoutNode.SRC: Most InterestingRecently AnsweredMy ears are almost kid sized and my old beats are constantly falling out. How adjustable are these buds?Asked by Riley P from irvine on Oct 11, 2018Answer now(My ears are almost kid sized and my old beats are constantly falling out. How adjustable are these buds?)1 Answer(My ears are almost kid sized and my old beats are constantly falling out. How adjustable are these buds?)How long do the BeatsX Earphones take to fully charge?Asked by Blair M from Carmel on Mar 4, 2017

LayoutNode.Content: Best Answer: It will take roughly 45 minutes to an hour to have them fully charged and of course with Fast Fuel, It will take roughly 45 minutes to an hour to have them fully charged and of course with Fast Fuel, 5 minutes of charging gets you more or less 2 hours of playback. Important to know, as it is not clearly mentioned in the documentation, while charging the light will be red and "breathing", once fully charged it will turn white. More (Read full answer) Answered by Jean-Christoph S from Hoeilaart on Nov 8, 2017
LayoutNode.SRC:

LayoutNode.Content: Best Answer:
LayoutNode.SRC: Best Answer:

LayoutNode.Content: I have been wondering the same thing. My iPhone X came with ear phones that have a male lightning pl I have been wondering the same thing. My iPhone X came with ear phones that have a male lightning plug at the end. After a recent trip to Israel I realize I could not use them on the airplane since the adapter on the armrest requires a dual 3.5 mm jack. After returning home I have searched high and low trying to find an aftermarket accessory that would convert my earphones. I am looking for a female lightning end to male 3.5mm jack. Once you have secured that, you can then purchase a 3.5 adapter with a dual end for the armrest. However, I have been unsuccessful in finding the adapter. Thanks Apple, for making it so we have to carry additional items that we shouldn’t have to have. If anyone finds such a creature, please post. More (Read full answer)
